name: Spirit's Revenge (LudumDare 30)
description:
Our first Ludum Dare game.

Game about death, souls and revenge.

That was hard for us.
Suppose we tried to make project too big for 72 hours.
But anyway, we did something, so this jam have some good result.

Programmer/Game designer - Dmitry Lagutov
Musician - Alexander Goryeslavets aka Blinch
Artist - Alexander Vetkin

Specially for Itch.io we made Remastered version of the game!

  • Fixed gameplay
  • changed physics
  • harder bosses
  • remade intro and outro
  • fixes many bugs
  • small graphics improvements
